uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.collection

Class StreamUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.collection.StreamUtilities

  • public class StreamUtilities
extends Object
    A collection of static utility methods for working with streams.

        public static <T> Stream<T> iterate(T root,
                                    Function<? super T,? extends T> mapping)
        A bit like Stream.iterate(Object, UnaryOperator) but not completely and utterly useless because it actually supports termination. TODO should hopefully be made redundant by takeWhile in Java 9
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the stream elements
        Parameters:
        root - the root element
        mapping - a mapping from an element to the next element
        Returns:
        a stream over each element in sequence

      • flatMapRecursive

        public static <T> Stream<T> flatMapRecursive(T root,
                                             Function<? super T,? extends Stream<? extends T>> mapping)
        Generate a stream which recursively traverses depth-first over the elements of some nested data structure starting from its root.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the stream elements
        Parameters:
        root - the root element
        mapping - a mapping from an element to a stream of its direct children
        Returns:
        a stream over the root and each of its children, as well as each of their children, in a depth first manner

      • flatMapRecursive

        public static <T> Stream<T> flatMapRecursive(Stream<? extends T> stream,
                                             Function<? super T,? extends Stream<? extends T>> mapping)
        Generate a stream which recursively traverses depth-first over the elements of some nested data structure starting from those in a given stream.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the stream elements
        Parameters:
        stream - the stream of initial elements
        mapping - a mapping from an element to a stream of its direct children
        Returns:
        a stream over elements in a tree and each of their children, as well as each of their children, in a depth first manner

      • flatMapRecursiveDistinct

        public static <T> Stream<T> flatMapRecursiveDistinct(T root,
                                                     Function<? super T,? extends Stream<? extends T>> mapping)
        Generate a stream which recursively traverses depth-first over the elements of some nested data structure starting from its root.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the stream elements
        Parameters:
        root - the root element
        mapping - a mapping from an element to a stream of its direct children
        Returns:
        a stream over the root and each of its children, as well as each of their children, in a depth first manner

      • flatMapRecursiveDistinct

        public static <T> Stream<T> flatMapRecursiveDistinct(Stream<? extends T> stream,
                                                     Function<? super T,? extends Stream<? extends T>> mapping)
        Generate a stream which recursively traverses depth-first over the elements of some nested data structure starting from those in a given stream.

        Repeated elements will be ignored.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the stream elements
        Parameters:
        stream - the stream of initial elements
        mapping - a mapping from an element to a stream of its direct children
        Returns:
        a stream over elements in a tree and each of their children, as well as each of their children, in a depth first manner

        protected static <T> Stream<T> flatMapRecursiveDistinct(Stream<? extends T> stream,
                                                        Function<? super T,? extends Stream<? extends T>> mapping,
                                                        Set<T> visited)
